title: Montclair State University
description: The brand colors for Montclair State University are cardinal red (#D1190D) and dark gray (#333333) as designated by their official brand guidelines. Detailed color information can be sourced from their university communications brand guidelines at [https://www.montclair.edu/university-communications/brand-guidelines/color-palette/](https://www.montclair.edu/university-communications/brand-guidelines/color-palette/).
